Module it.polimi.ingsw

Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.events

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionEvent
    This Event is used by the client to send to the server a Position on a board, on which it wants to perform some operation: select a worker, move, build
    BoardEvent
    This event is used by the server to notify the clients about some changes happened to a game board
    CardEvent
    This Event is used to carry a specific god power/card, of type EGodPower
    ChoiceEvent
    This Event is used by the server, to ask the client a question with 2 possible answers, usually regarding the will to use a god power by che client, to answer the binary question
    DisconnectedEvent
    This Event is used to indicate that some kind of client disconnection has happened, either voluntarily or accidentally
    ErrorEvent
    This Event is used by the server to notify a client of a generic error
    Event
    Event is the generic interface for events (that is, sophisticated messages exchanged by client and server It implements the Serializable interface, so that an event can be sent through the network using an object stream
    GameOverEvent
    This Event is used by the server to notify all the clients still connected to a game that a game over has been reached.
    HighlightEvent
    This Event contains a list of Positions that have to be highlighted client-side, to inform a player about his possible next moves.
    LoseEvent
    This Event is used by the server to notify the clients of a game that someone lost
    MessageEvent
    MessageEvent represents an Event for a simple text message.
    PingEvent
    This Event represents a ping message, a simple and light heartbeat bounced back and forth by client and server and used by both to check that the other is still reachable through the network
    PlayerNicknameEvent
    This Event is sent by a client to the server and contains the nickname of one of the players in the game to which that client belongs
    SetChallengerEvent
    This Event is used by the server to notify the clients of a game about the chosen challenger for a game
    SetCurrentPlayerEvent
    This Event is used by the server to notify the clients of a game about the current player, setting a new value for it
    SetFirstPlayerEvent
    This Event is used by the server to notify the clients of a game about the first player, set by the challenger during the initialization
    SetNicknameEvent
    This Event is used by the server as an ack, to notify a client that the nickname that was sent is valid and it is now assigned to it
    SetNPlayersEvent
    This Event is used by the server as an ack, to notify a client that is choice on the number of players was valid and accepted
    StartGameEvent
    StartGameEvent is an Event that is invoked when a new game has started, to notify all the connected players that the new game is ready to begin and tell them about the nicknames of their opponents
    StartupPhaseEvent
    StartupPhaseEvent is an Event that is invoked when we have to set a new EStartupPhase.
    TurnPhaseEvent
    TurnPhaseEvent is an Event that is invoked when a new ETurnPhase has to be set
